page.title: 14SHOPPING SURVEY IN MT. ASH
page.content: In a survey of shopping in Montain Ash,we discovered many facts about habits of shopping in the town.Most of the shoppers were local,having come no more than 2 miles and either walked or made use of public transport.Many tended to shop about twice a week usually on a Friday(when there is an open air market)or Saturday and spent an average of 1to 2 hours in the town. Most of the shopping was for food or other general household items. The majority of people questioned considered Mountain Ash to be a poor shopping centre, and for clothes or larger household items, they travelled to other towns such as Aberdare or Pontypridd or even into the city of Cardiff about 20 miles away.
